interestingcomments.content:
Creating low maintenance privacy /!/ Hi! I bought my first home in Oakland, CA at the beginning of March; I’ve only ever lived in apartments, so I don’t really know where to start with landscaping and yard maintenance. I would love to do plant some shrubs or trees (or other plants) to help make my backyard feel more private. The backyard gets lots of sun. The fence that’s...missing...is a result of my neighbors halted construction, but will go back up eventually. 

I don’t play boules, so that sand strip to the side can definitely go. 

I’d love some suggestions on plants and/or books/videos I could watch to start making my backyard more private. I’m not experienced with plants, so am hoping to create something low maintenance. And! I have a mower arriving on Monday so I can take care of that grass. 

[photos of the backyard](https://imgur.com/gallery/35r1AnF)
